name: Bingo - FREE Video Bingo + Multiplayer Bingo Games
name_original: Bingo - FREE Video Bingo + Multiplayer Bingo Games
description:
Play BINGO like never before!
Every game grants rewards to level up and unlock new rooms.
Pick your bingo cards, daub the called numbers and call out Bingo as soon as you have it! As simple it gets.
Score a bingo in 13 different ways & win big.
Use some powerups like free daubs, extra coins, extra gold and more!
High quality graphics and a wide variety of themes.
Compete with thousands of people around the globe.
Awesome power-ups to help you through the game.
Collect FREE Chips & Gold every day you come to play, just by spinning the Daily Bonus Wheel.
Collect FREE Chips every 2 hours with a special slot machine! Try your luck every 2 hours.
Download NOW to get a FREE bonus chips & gold in the game.
Tons of great new games are on the way!

Features:

• Awesome Powerups like free gold, instant bingo & more
• Play upto 4 cards at once & have fun.
• Lots of amazing bingo rooms to explore
• Play all our Games for FREE!
• A Daily Spin with all manner of lucrative prizes
• Get huge coin rewards for having your friends play the game.

Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection to play.

There's always more! Our team is already developing content for our next major update!
 This game is for amusement purposes only & is intended for use by players 21 and over.
